name: MicroVore
description:
Ludum dare 46 Submission.
You must feed it to keep it alive.
Play with gamepad, arrow keys or WSAD.

Everything is built in the VFXGraph no meshes or sprites.

I did not get as far as I would have liked with actual game play and ended up just focusing on making a pretty experience.

There was quite a bit of content that was finished but that did not get put in by the deadline, and there were a few major performance issues I did not fix.

I will upload a post Jam build soon that should be a lot more pleasant to play.

Thanks to Avola for the soundtrack!
https://avola.bandcamp.com/
